thread.title: Taraji P. Henson Is Wearing Custom Alberta Ferretti at the 2017 Oscars
thread.title_full: Taraji P. Henson Is Wearing Custom Alberta Ferretti at the 2017 Oscars

title: Taraji P. Henson Is Wearing Custom Alberta Ferretti at the 2017 Oscars
text:
Taraji P. Henson at the 2017 Oscars. The 'Hidden Figures' actress is among this evening's presenters. 
Taraji P. Henson stepped out in a navy off-the-shoulder velvet gown with a thigh-high slit at the 2017 Oscars on Sunday. 
Styled by Jason Bolden, the Hidden Figures actress paired her the custom Alberta Ferretti look with Nirav Modi jewels, and Jimmy Choo shoes and bag. 
Henson, who was nominated for best supporting actress in The Curious Case of Benjamin Button (2008), joins Meryl Streep, Matt Damon, Faye Dunaway, Warren Beatty, Octavia Spencer, Ryan Gosling, Salma Hayek, Dev Patel and more as this evening's presenters. 
Hidden Figures is nominated for best picture and best writing adapted screenplay. Octavia Spencer is also nominated for best supporting actress for her role in Hidden Figures . 
The 89th Academy Awards, hosted by Jimmy Kimmel, airs live on ABC at 5:30 p.m. PT/8:30 p.m. ET.
